title: Add a Submodule (Challenge)
description: Submodules are a way to include one Git repository as a subdirectory of another Git repository. This can be useful when you want to include a third-party library or a shared codebase in your project. In this challenge, you will learn how to add a submodule to a Git repository.

meta.title: Add a Submodule: A Git Playground Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to add a submodule to a Git repository and include a third-party library or shared codebase in your project.
meta.keywords: git repository, git labs, programming tutorial, git, submodule, git playground
